text.div:
Healthcheck

OPERATION: Check the health of the server

The healthcheck operation checks whether the server is able to connect to the database.

URL: [base]/$healthcheck

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
OUTreturn1..1OperationOutcome

If the operation outcome is not present or is present but lists no errors, then the server is expected to be healthy.

name: Healthcheck
description: The healthcheck operation checks whether the server is able to connect to the database.

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: If the operation outcome is not present or is present but lists no errors, then the server is expected to be healthy.
